plugin-2: button to the Mastodon interface to launch this webpage.
plugin-install-unavailable: Plugin is not available for your browser
instructions-p1:
This page helps prepare a thread (series of toots) for Mastodon and post it in one go.
Type your text, add your media, click "Add toot" to continue,
then click "Post thread" when you're done.
instructions-p2:
You can also paste text in the first box,
if it flows over MastoThreader will split it into toots for you.
instructions-p3: Enter your Mastodon instance below and click "Connect" to get started.
instructions-p4: This is a static site which does not collect any of your data.
legacy: In case of any issues, an older version of Mastothreader can be accessed
clear-storage: If authentication fails, click here and try again.
instance-confirm: You are logged into a different instance. Do you want to change?
user-confirm: You are logged in as a different user. Do you want to reauthenticate?
instance-warning: You are not connected to Mastodon.
app-warning: The app is not authorized on your instance. Please reauthenticate.
server-busy: Server is busy. Please try again later.
alt-text-placeholder: Add a description to your media
bsky-rate-warning: Too many connection attempts. Please retry in
cancel-scheduled-default: Choose a scheduled toot to cancel
schedule-warning: Scheduling threads is not supported yet. You can only schedule one toot at a time.
bsky-confirm: Do you want to import the Bluesky thread?
bsky-author-warning: You are not the author of this thread. Do you want to connect to a different account?
convert-handles-confirm: Do you want to attempt to convert handles?
bsky-warning: You are not connected to Bluesky. Authenticate?
wp-confirm: Do you want to import the Wordpress post?
thread-ready: The thread is ready, remember to review it before posting!
media-alert: You have reached the maximum number of images.
over-limit: The file exceeds the maximum size of
empty-toot: Your first toot cannot be empty
media-error-confirm: Some media files have no description. Post anyway?
media-error-alert: A media item could not be attached
thread-published: Your thread is now published. To close your session (shared computer), click 'Reset'.
user-info-error: Could not retrieve your user information. Please reauthenticate.
